unnormalised: **Builder Reviews Gain Traction in Indian Real Estate**
normalised: **Builder Reviews Gain Traction in Indian Real Estate**

unnormalised: Tired of endless property listings and glossy brochures? Savvy homebuyers across India are turning to builder review platforms before investing their hard-earned Rs. in a new home. Think of it like Zomato, but for real estate!
normalised: Tired of endless property listings and glossy brochures? Savvy homebuyers across India are turning to builder review platforms before investing their hard-earned rupees in a new home. Think of it like Zomato, but for real estate!

unnormalised: Sites like "GharDekho India" and "Property Pandit Ji" are providing platforms where buyers can share their experiences, both good and bad, about developers. Did Mr. Sharma in Bandra have a seamless experience with Oberoi Realty? Or did Mrs. Kapoor in Gurgaon face delays with DLF?
normalised: Sites like "GharDekho India" and "Property Pandit Ji" are providing platforms where buyers can share their experiences, both good and bad, about developers. Did Mister Sharma in Bandra have a seamless experience with Oberoi Realty? Or did Missus Kapoor in Gurgaon face delays with D L F?

unnormalised: These reviews cover everything from construction quality and amenities to post-sales service and project timelines. Experts say these platforms are empowering consumers, ensuring greater transparency in a traditionally opaque market. Dr. Patel from IIM Ahmedabad notes, "This shift will force builders to prioritize customer satisfaction."
normalised: These reviews cover everything from construction quality and amenities to post-sales service and project timelines. Experts say these platforms are empowering consumers, ensuring greater transparency in a traditionally opaque market. Doctor Patel from I I M Ahmedabad notes, "This shift will force builders to prioritize customer satisfaction."

unnormalised: A recent survey revealed that over 70% of prospective buyers in Mumbai and Delhi NCR consult online reviews before booking a property, even small 1BHK flats of 500 sq ft. So, before you put down that booking amount, do your homework! It could save you a lot of heartache – and Rs.!
normalised: A recent survey revealed that over seventy percent of prospective buyers in Mumbai and Delhi N C R consult online reviews before booking a property, even small one B H K flats of five hundred square feet. So, before you put down that booking amount, do your homework! It could save you a lot of heartache – and rupees!
